mapper.select: SELECT jy.lcidCode ,jy.hospitalId ,jy.patientId ,jy.lcidName ,jy.lcidpGroup ,jy.lcidtResult ,jy.lcidinOut ,jy.lcidArea ,jy.pDoctor ,jy.lcidoDate ,jy.lciddDate ,jy.lcidrDate ,jy.adminId ,jy.lcidDate ,pit.pName FROM junyum jy JOIN patient pit ON jy.hospitalId = pit.hospitalId AND jy.patientId = pit.patientId WHERE jy.patientId = 'patientId01'
